welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Qiryat Mal'akhi! Located in the heart of Israel, our charming city is known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our beautiful streets, taste our delicious local cuisine, and immerse yourself in our vibrant culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main and largest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
